description:
In a special bonus holiday interview episode, Danny chats with Rachael Leigh Cook (actress/producer) about her her iconic roles in She's All That (as well as the upcoming reboot), Josie and the Pussycats, her drug PSA, and lots more! Then, Danny chats with legend Marie Osmond about her career, working with Lucille Ball, holiday movies, and more. Danny's mom, Linda, joins the convo as one of Marie's biggest fans.


Rachael Leigh Cook: 3:05ish

Marie Osmond: 31:45ish


Buy Everything Iconic merch at EverythingIconic.store
